00026 #ifndef NEWTS_ACCESS_H
00027 #define NEWTS_ACCESS_H
00028 
00029 #include "newts/config.h"
00030 #include "newts/list.h"
00031 #include "newts/notesfile.h"
00032 
00036 enum access_scopes
00037   {
00038     SCOPE_USER,  
00039     SCOPE_GROUP, 
00040     SCOPE_SYSTEM 
00041   };
00042 
00046 enum access_permissions
00047   {
00048     READ     = 01,  
00049     WRITE    = 02,  
00050     DIRECTOR = 04,  
00052     REPLY    = 010, 
00053     OWNER    = 020  
00054   };
00055 
00059 struct access
00060 {
00061   char *name;               
00063   enum access_scopes scope; 
00064   unsigned permissions;     
00066 };
